summary: After Nurses George and A.J. of the Shady Oaks Retirement Village witness Carl leaving with his house towed by balloons, other senior citizens around the city are inspired to make their own "escapes", much to George and A.J.'s chagrin.
cast: Jason Topolski|A.J. Riebli III|Steve Purcell|Peter Sohn|Bob Peterson|Kim Donovan|Claire Munzer|Valerie LaPointe
title: George y A.J.
